Package de.thbin.epro.core

Class ServiceBrokerImpl

java.lang.Object
de.thbin.epro.core.ServiceBrokerImpl
@Controller
public class ServiceBrokerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a REST controller, written according to the Open Service Broker API (see https://github.com/openservicebrokerapi/servicebroker)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ServiceBrokerImpl()
    Constructor for initializing the catalog and the helm deployer.

      Returns:
